EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityNumberOfEmployees.label: Entity Number of Employees
EntityNumberOfEmployees.description: Number of persons employed by the Entity

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties, Current
AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccruedRentCurrent.label: Accrued Rent, Current
AccruedRentCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedRentNoncurrent.label: Accrued Rent, Noncurrent
AccruedRentNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for contractual rent under lease arrangements.

AccruedRoyaltiesCurrent.label: Accrued Royalties, Current
AccruedRoyaltiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncr.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Increase in Carrying Amount of Redeemable Preferred Stock
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncr.description: Amount of decrease (increase) in additional paid in capital (APIC) for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Incurred
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCos.label: Business Combination, Acquisition Related Costs
BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCos.description: This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Remeasurement Gain
BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.label: Capitalized Costs, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion, Amortization and Valuation Allowance Relating to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and valuation allowance relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Gross
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Net
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.label: Capitalized Costs, Proved Properties
CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.description: Capitalized costs of proved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions; wells and related equipment; support equipment and facilities; and uncompleted wells and equipment and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

CapitalizedCostsUnprovedProperties.label: Capitalized Costs, Unproved Properties
CapitalizedCostsUnprovedProperties.description: Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

ContributionOfProperty.label: Contribution of Property
ContributionOfProperty.description: Value of property contributed in noncash investing and financing activities.

ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.description: "The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties with Proved Reserves
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have proved reserves.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfUnprovedOilAnd.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Unproved Oil and Gas Properties
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfUnprovedOilAnd.description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have unproved reserves.

CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.label: Costs Incurred, Development Costs
CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.description: Development costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

CostsIncurredExplorationCosts.label: Costs Incurred, Exploration Costs
CostsIncurredExplorationCosts.description: Exploration costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredTaxAssetsInvestmentInSubsidiarie.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Investment in Subsidiaries
DeferredTaxAssetsInvestmentInSubsidiarie.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the entity's investment in its wholly-owned subsidiaries.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Alternative Minimum Tax
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible alternative minimum tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DepositsAssetsNoncurrent.label: Deposits Assets, Noncurrent
DepositsAssetsNoncurrent.description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Noncurrent
DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.description: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationGai.label: Disposal Group, Not Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal
DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationGai.description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

DueFromAffiliateCurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Current
DueFromAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Noncurrent
DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueToAffiliateCurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Current
DueToAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DueToAffiliateNoncurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Noncurrent
DueToAffiliateNoncurrent.description: Amount of receivables owed to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle, if longer).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.label: Embedded Derivative, Fair Value of Embedded Derivative Liability
EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as a liability.

EmbeddedDerivativeGainLossOnEmbeddedDeri.label: Embedded Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Embedded Derivative, Net
EmbeddedDerivativeGainLossOnEmbeddedDeri.description: Net Increase or Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

EmbeddedDerivativeLossOnEmbeddedDerivati.label: Embedded Derivative, Loss on Embedded Derivative
EmbeddedDerivativeLossOnEmbeddedDerivati.description: Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

ExplorationAbandonmentAndImpairmentExpen.label: Exploration Abandonment and Impairment Expense
ExplorationAbandonmentAndImpairmentExpen.description: The adjustment to expense previously capitalized costs of drilling exploratory wells when proved reserves are not found or when the entity obtains information that raises substantial doubt about the economic or operational viability of the project.

ExplorationExpense.label: Exploration Expense
ExplorationExpense.description: "Exploration expenses (including prospecting) related to oil and gas producing entities and would be included in operating expenses of that entity. Costs incurred in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: (i) Costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or ""G&G"" costs. (ii) Costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, and the maintenance of land and lease records. (iii) Dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions. (iv) Costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells. (v) Costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells."

ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Development Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Income Tax Expense
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for income tax, based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Production Costs
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in producing proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnSaleOfOilAndGasProperty.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas Property
GainLossOnSaleOfOilAndGasProperty.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of proven and unproven oil and gas properties.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GasGatheringTransportationMarketingAndPr.label: Gas Gathering, Transportation, Marketing and Processing Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
GasGatheringTransportationMarketingAndPr.description: Cost incurred related to the gas activities, such as transportation, marketing and processing crude oil, natural gas and refined petroleum products.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.label: Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.description: The expense recorded to reduce the value of oil and gas assets consisting of proved properties and unproved properties as the estimate of future successful production from these properties is reduced.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax.label: Income (Loss) from Subsidiaries, before Tax
IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations, Adjustment of Deferred Tax (Asset) Liability
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.

IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsL.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Equity in Earnings (Losses) of Unconsolidated Subsidiary, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsL.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.label: Changes in Estimated Future Development Costs
IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in estimated future development costs.

IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.label: Changes in Future Income Tax Expense Estimates on Future Cash Flows Related to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in the estimated future income tax on future pretax net cash flows related to the entity's proved oil and gas reserves.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInRoyaltiesPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Royalties Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInRoyaltiesPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for compensation payments related to the use of copyrights, patents, trade names, licenses, technology. Royalty payments are also paid by the lease holders for oil, gas, and mineral extraction.

IncreaseDueToPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace.label: Increase Due to Purchases of Minerals in Place
IncreaseDueToPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace.description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of purchases of minerals in place.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

InterestCostsCapitalized.label: Interest Costs Capitalized
InterestCostsCapitalized.description: Amount of interest capitalized during the period.

InterestCostsIncurred.label: Interest Costs Incurred
InterestCostsIncurred.description: Total interest costs incurred during the period and either capitalized or charged against earnings.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Nonoperating, Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet.description: The net amount of nonoperating interest income (expense).

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.label: Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Members or Limited Partners, Ownership Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.description: Percentage investment held by members or limited partners of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLlcMembersEquityI.label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Members' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLlcMembersEquityI.description: Amount of ownership interest in a limited liability company (LLC), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

MembersEquity.label: Members' Equity
MembersEquity.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC), attributable to the parent entity.

MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Members' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC) directly or indirectly attributable to noncontrolling interests.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Noncontrolling Owners
MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.description: The equity interest of noncontrolling shareholders, partners or other equity holders in consolidated entity.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OilAndGasProductionExpense.label: Oil and Gas Production Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasProductionExpense.description: Costs incurred to operate and maintain an entities' wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities.

OilAndGasRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasRevenue.description: Aggregate revenue during the period related to oil and gas business activities.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Received
OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.description: "The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration received in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.label: Partners' Capital Account, Private Placement of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessThreeNetOfCashA.label: Payments to Acquire Business Three, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessThreeNetOfCashA.description: The cash outflow associated with a third acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessTwoNetOfCashAcq.label: Payments to Acquire Business Two, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessTwoNetOfCashAcq.description: The cash outflow associated with a second acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset for use in the normal oil and gas operations and to purchase mineral interests in oil and gas properties not intended for resale.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.label: Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.description: The aggregate value of preferred stock dividends and other adjustments necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.label: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred
PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncur.description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses, Net of Cash Divested
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInPartnershipU.label: Proceeds from Sale of Interest in Partnership Unit
ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInPartnershipU.description: The proceeds from the sale of an interest in a unit of partnership.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.label: Proceeds from Sale of Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.description: The cash inflow to dispose of long-lived, physical assets and mineral interests in oil and gas properties used for normal oil and gas operations.

ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Extension and Discovery (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExte.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetE.description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Production (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProd.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservePurc.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Purchase of Mineral in Place (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservePurc.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from purchase of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Revision of Previous Estimate (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevi.description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas related to revision of a previous estimate resulting from new information, except for an increase in proved acreage, or change in economic factors, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.label: Proved Developed Reserves (Energy)
ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1.description: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Energy)
ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1.description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityFa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Fair Value
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityFa.description: The aggregate fair value as of the reporting date of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsExpenseOther.label: Results of Operations, Expense, Other
ResultsOfOperationsExpenseOther.description: Other costs for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsExplorationExpense.label: Results of Operations, Exploration Expense
ResultsOfOperationsExplorationExpense.description: Exploration costs from oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsGeneralAndAdministrat.label: Results of Operations, General and Administrative Related to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsGeneralAndAdministrat.description: General and administrative costs from oil & gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes.label: Taxes, Miscellaneous
TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes.description: All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.

UnprovedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffor.label: Unproved Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method
UnprovedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffor.description: Oil and Gas properties with unproved reserves under the successful effort method.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.
